info.title: MyPetly API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for MyPetly.

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the authenticated user.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

error.example: Detailed error message if in debug mode

post.description: Update the profile information of the authenticated user, including profile photo.

name: The name field is required.
email: The email must be a valid email address.
photo: The photo must be an image.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

error.example: Detailed error message if in debug mode

put.description: Allows the authenticated user to change their password.

new_password: The new password must be at least 8 characters.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

error.example: Detailed error message if in debug mode

post.description: Deactivate the authenticated user's account by marking it as inactive.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

error.example: Detailed error message if in debug mode

delete.description: Permanently delete the authenticated user's account.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

error.example: Detailed error message if in debug mode

get.description: Retrieve a list of all animals for the authenticated user

error.example: Detailed error message

post.description: Add a new animal profile for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific animal owned by the authenticated user

put.description: Update the details of an existing animal

delete.description: Delete an animal profile owned by the authenticated user

post.summary: Téléverser/mettre à jour la photo d’un animal
post.description: Remplace l’image d’un animal. Format multipart/form-data.

post.summary: Attach a collar to an animal
post.description: Attach a unique NFC/QR collar to the specified animal

collar_id: The collar ID must be unique.

put.description: Update the status of an animal to 'lost'
Update the status of an animal to 'active' after being found

get.description: Retrieve public details of an animal by scanning its NFC/QR collar
